io.micronaut.configuration.jdbc.ucp

Class ConnectionPoolManagerListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.micronaut.configuration.jdbc.ucp.ConnectionPoolManagerListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    io.micronaut.context.event.BeanCreatedEventListener<DataSource>, io.micronaut.core.order.Ordered, EventListener

    @Singleton
 @Requires(classes=oracle.ucp.jdbc.PoolDataSource.class) @Requires(property="ucp-manager.enabled",notEquals="false",defaultValue="true")
 @Internal
public class ConnectionPoolManagerListener
extends Object
implements io.micronaut.context.event.BeanCreatedEventListener<DataSource>, io.micronaut.core.order.Ordered
    BeanCreatedEventListener that starts the PoolDataSource using the UniversalConnectionPoolManager.
    Since:
    4.0.3
    Author:
    Pavol Gressa
